short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Double-pressing the ESC key allows the current tab to be closed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Close Tab with ESC" Extension

The "Close Tab with ESC" extension is designed to offer Chrome users a faster and more efficient browsing experience. With this extension, users can instantly close the active tab by double-pressing the ESC key. 

Especially when working with multiple tabs, this feature helps users save time and streamline their browsing.

Features:
- Close the active tab by quickly double-pressing the ESC key.
- Lightweight and fast: The extension won't affect your browser's performance.
- Easy to use: No additional settings required after installation.

Enhance your browsing experience by installing the "Close Tab with ESC" extension now!
